snippet: Democratic Senate leader Harry Reid called Republican Senator Mitch McConnell on Tuesday to congratulate him on becoming the new majority leader in the U.S. Senate, Reid's office said in a statement....

headline.print_headline: Reid Congratulates McConnell on Becoming U.S. Senate Majority Leader
headline.main: Reid Congratulates McConnell on Becoming U.S. Senate Majority Leader

lead_paragraph: Democratic Senate leader Harry Reid called Republican Senator Mitch McConnell on Tuesday to congratulate him on becoming the new majority leader in the U.S. Senate, Reid's office said in a statement.
